List 1

25 Feb 2018   #Vacabulary

abandon oneself to emotion; abandon the home 放纵 放弃

He was unwilling to abase himself by pleading guilty to a crime that he did not commit. 降低

feel abashed in public 使尴尬 使羞愧

abate his rage/pain; abate a tax 减轻 减少

abbreviate the word “building” as “bldg.” 缩写

abdicate the throne/crown 正式放弃
